descriptions.description: A JSON reader and writer which is super-effiecient and usually runs circles around other JSON libraries. It's highly customizable to optimize for your particular project, and very lightweight.

set.commands: PACKAGE_NAME=libjson PACKAGE_VERSION=7.6.1 oegenv 32 oegcleanbase oegextract ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}.tar.gz #oegimport libiconv-1.14 #oegimport gettext-0.18.3 configure --prefix=${OEG_BASE_DIR} make make install-strip DESTDIR=${OEG_INSTALL_DIR} cd "${OEG_INSTALL_DIR}${OEG_BASE_DIR}" oegarchive ${PACKAGE_NAME}-${PACKAGE_VERSION}
